awd_titl_txt: Preparation, Printing, and Distribution of a Uniform Series of Antarctic Geologic Maps
awd_abstract_narration: The U.S. Geological Survey will continue the final drafting,                    printing, and distribution of a uniform series geologic maps of                 Antarctica.  The maps to be produced under this arrangement will                be selected by the National Science Foundation each fiscal year                 depending on the availability of material and other related                     factors.  For fiscal year 1988 work will begin on selected maps                 from the Central Transantarctic Mountains.                                                                                                                      No antarctic field work will be carried out under this                          interagency agreement.

inst.inst_name: UNITED STATES DEPT OF GEOLOGICAL SURVEY
